named-query.name: Maintext.getAdhyayByParvaId
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT(a.maintextPK.adhyayid) FROM Maintext a WHERE a.maintextPK.parvaId = :parvaId

named-query.name: Maintext.findShlokByParvaAndAdhyayId
named-query.query: SELECT m FROM Maintext m WHERE m.maintextPK.parvaId = :parvaId AND m.maintextPK.adhyayid = :adhyayId

named-query.name: Maintext.findMaxShlokaNum
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(a.maintextPK.shlokanum) FROM Maintext a WHERE a.maintextPK.parvaId = :parvaId AND a.maintextPK.adhyayid = :adhyayId

named-query.name: Maintext.findMaxShlokaLine
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(a.maintextPK.shlokaline) FROM Maintext a WHERE a.maintextPK.parvaId = :parvaId AND a.maintextPK.adhyayid = :adhyayId AND a.maintextPK.shlokanum = :shlokaNum
